mapper.sql: id, username, password, name, birthday, sex, address
mapper.insert:
insert into user
id,
username,
password,
name,
birthday,
sex,
address,

mapper.update:
update user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
